summary: International Development practitioner, with over 25 years' experience in agriculture, sustainable land management, natural resources & environment, climate change and disaster risk management. Worked in Africa, Asia and Europe with several international and national organizations in different capacities (Project Manager, Consultant, Expert, Adviser, Team Leader) and under different settings. Strives to put development theory into practice for sustainable development solutions. Currently independent senior consultant and Director of Gondwana Consulting, based in The Hague, Netherlands, working mainly on Natural Resources – Landscapes – Biodiversity – Climate Change – Agriculture and its effects on Livelihoods and People.
